name: Watermelon Glow PHA +BHA Pore-Tight Toner

Suitable for all skin types, this bouncy, alcohol-free toner is made with PHA and willow bark, a natural form of BHA, to help unclog pores while hydrating skin. Due to cactus water and cucumber in the formula, scent is herbal with a fruity finish.

- 90% of subjects saw a significant reduction in pore size

What Else You Need to Know:

Formulated with antioxidant-rich fruit extracts and a soothing and nourishing blend of African oils, this balm cleanser transforms from an oil to a milk to cleanse and moisturize, leaving behind a dewy glow.
This cleanser is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

name: Pure One Step Camellia Oil Cleanser
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A two-in-one makeup remover and cleanser with camellia oil that gently melts away impurities, even waterproof makeup, leaving behind pure, silky soft skin.
If you want to know more…

Pure One Step Camellia Cleansing Oil thoroughly cleanses the skin without stripping natural moisture, leaving it balanced and nourished. It does not contain mineral oil, so the liquid emulsifies completely and leaves no residue.
Japanese camellia oil (tsubaki) is richer in oleic acid than olive oil and an excellent source of vitamins A, B, D, and E and nourishing Omegas 3, 6, and 9.
What else you need to know:

Anko, the camellia-harvesting women of Oshima Island were famed for their glowing skin and long, lustrous hair. Geisha discovered their secret was the oil from the seeds of the winter-blooming camellia flower and used it for centuries to remove their iconic stage makeup without drying or damaging the skin. Tatcha has advanced this treasure in the Pure One Step Camellia Cleansing Oil.

This product is noncomedogenic, non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, and TEA.
Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—Victoria Tsai, Founder

about the product:
Which skin type is it good for?

✔ Normal
✔ Oily

What it is:

 A pore-refining toner with salicylic, glycolic, and lactic acids to remove excess oil, clarify, and freshen the complexion without stripping skin.

Solutions for:

- Oiliness
- Pores
- Acne and blemishes

If you want to know more…

 This concentrated facial astringent effectively removes excess oil and refines pores—without stripping skin. Formulated with Green Fusion Complex™, a powerful blend of both BHA and AHAs—salicylic, glycolic and lactic acids—and neem seed oil, its gentle clarifying action helps unclog, purify, and minimize the appearance of pores. This refreshing toner features an energizing eucalyptus-peppermint scent. Instantly, the complexion is fresh and invigorated with a matte, healthy-looking glow.

What else you need to know:

 During his struggle with cystic acne, Ole tried many astringent toners that left his skin feeling stripped. He was challenged to create his own version that delivered powerful results, but with a more comfortable, balanced feel.
This toner features Ole Henriksen’s Green Fusion Complex™, a proprietary blend of potent active botanicals—including  green tea, eucalyptus, algae (kelp), and Irish moss extracts—with natural antiseptic properties to help absorb excess oil and refine pores.
This product is noncomedogenic. It is a 2018 Teen Vogue Acne Award winner in the toner category. It is an 
Allure
 Best of Beauty award winner.

 In a consumer study on 36 women after 4 weeks:  
- 100% said it removes residual dirt, makeup, and impurities
- 100% said it removes oil

name: The Rice Polish Foaming Enzyme Powder
about the product:
Which skin type is it good for?
✔ Normal
✔ Oily
✔ Combination
✔ Dry
✔ Sensitive
What it is:
A water-activated exfoliant of nourishing Japanese rice bran that transforms to a creamy foam for smooth, polished skin.
Solutions for:

- Dullness and uneven texture
- Fine lines and wrinkles
- Pores
If you want to know more…
The Polished Rice Enzyme Powders provide non-abrasive daily exfoliation to create a smooth, makeup-ready canvas.   Rice and papaya enzymes delivered in a creamy, rich foam soften, exfoliate, and gently release debris, promoting healthy, natural skin turnover to instantly reveal glowing, baby-soft skin. Hadasei-3™—a trio of anti-aging Japanese superfoods green tea, rice, and algae—helps restore youthful radiance. Daily use helps to visibly reduce the appearance of fine lines, uneven skin tone, and hyperpigmentation.

Each Rice Enzyme Powder contains active ingredients tailored to your skin type's needs:
- Classic (best for normal/combination/dry skin): nourishes and conditions with crushed pearl extract.
- Deep (best for combination/oily skin): Japanese wild rose diminishes the look of pores and refines skin texture, while Japanese leopard lily clarifies skin and helps prevent breakouts.
- Gentle (best for dry skin): licorice root extract moisturizes and helps prevent tightness.
- Indigo (best for sensitive skin): natural Japanese indigo calms and soothes easily irritated and inflamed skin.

What else you need to know:
The heart of the geisha’s beauty ritual is daily exfoliation to prepare a perfectly smooth canvas for her performance makeup.  For centuries, geisha used the milky water from the first wash of rice for soft, clear skin and to polish their most delicate treasures. The Polished Classic Rice Enzyme Powder brings this secret to the modern makeup lover. 
This pure formula is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It does not include harsh abrasives that can damage skin or cause inflammation, and is formulated without mineral oil, synthetic fragrances, urea, DEA, or TEA.
Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—Victoria Tsai, Founder

about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A powerful antiaging exfoliator formulated for blemish-prone skin.
If you want to know more…

This daily use skin polish is a skin resurfacing treatment and the first step in The Lancer Method. Formulated with a two-pronged approach to exfoliation, this unique polish includes pure minerals and pumpkin and pomegranate enzymes to gently and effectively remove surface debris and dull, dry surface cells. It’s formulated with salicylic acid and lilac stem cell compound to help manage oily and congested skin.
What else you need to know:

Using his unrivaled clinical experience, Dr. Lancer worked to develop a line of technologically advanced, active ingredient-focused products designed to improve the overall health and appearance of skin, while also giving patients the sought-after ‘Lancer Glow.’ Backed by first-class dermatology, utmost luxury, and true efficacy, Lancer Skincare seeks to bring “Believable Beauty” to all skin.

The Lancer Method, the core of Dr. Lancer’s philosophy, is based on a biological principle universal to all skin: the cellular cycle of renewal. By devising a system that supports this process through manual exfoliation, Dr. Lancer was able to create a unique antiaging line that delivers beautiful, glowing results to all skin types. The three steps of The Lancer Method dramatically improve the appearance of fine lines, texture, discoloration, and pore size. All of the Lancer Skincare treatments are formulated for optimum efficacy and luminous results.
“If your skin is troubled with active blemishes, I suggest using the polish every other evening for the first week, then every evening after that, building up to twice a day.”—Dr. Lancer

An ultramoisturizing, pearlized wash that gently exfoliates to restore radiance and protect skin’s natural moisture barrier.

Renewing Cleansing Cream is a highly-concentrated, ultramoisturizing cleanser formulated to rejuvenate and rebalance hormonally aging skin. Papaya enzymes provide non-abrasive exfoliation while algae extract hydrates, soothes, and firms skin. Apricot and starflower oils work to provide intense hydration and improve skin resilience while essential fatty acids help maintain skin’s barrier function. Renewing Cleansing Cream is recommended as a step one cleanser in any Murad resurgence regimen and restores skin’s youthful glow as part of Dr. Murad’s Inclusive Health® system of care.

- Parabens
- Sulfates 
- Phthalates

RepleniCell™, Murad’s patent-pending, proprietary technology, helps skin act younger in three ways: it helps skin attract water; it binds water to the skin; and it helps skin retain water. This product is dermatologist developed, scientifically proven, and is not tested on animals.

Research results:

In a Murad Inclusive Health Center® study, after using Resurgence for 30 days:
- 98% of women saw an improvement in the overall health of their skin
- 100% of women reported they were more hydrated
- 96% of women reported that their skin looked and felt firmer
- 93.9% of women saw a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
- 94% of women reported that their pores appear to be smaller and less visible
- 88% of women reported their skin looked and felt significantly smoother
Regimen consisted of Renewing Cleansing Cream, Age-Diffusing Serum, Sheer Lustre Day Moisture SPF 15 | PA+++ and Age-Balancing Night Cream. Individual results will vary. Study results on file.

name: Baby Pekee Bar™ + Juju Bar Travel Duo
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A Juju Bar and Pekee Bar™ as a travel-sized duo.
If you want to know more…

The JuJu Bar is a multitasking exfoliating bar designed to effectively cleanse while gently removing dead skin cells from the surface of the skin. Uniquely formulated with thermal mud and bamboo powder, Juju Bar creates a creamy lather that dissolves unwanted oil, rinsing away pore-clogging surface debris and any impurities. It refines skin texture, brightens skin clarity, and helps minimize the look of pores.

Truly in a league of its own, Pekee Bar™ is a gentle cleansing bar that moisturizes, clarifies, and balances the complexion. Infused with a blend of blueberry extract, marula oil, and honey, Pekee Bar tones and promotes moisture retention.
What else you need to know:

Unlike soap, which has a pH level of nine or above, the JuJu Bar and Pekee Bar are formulated with skin-friendly ingredients designed to cleanse and soothe the skin. The Juju Bar has an ideal pH-level of 6.3 and Pekee Bar is at 6.3 to ensure sufficient cleansing without drying or stripping the skin of its protective barrier. Both are free of soap, fragrance, essential oil, silicone, and irritant. Juju Bar is vegan.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.
In an independent consumer testing panel of 101 women ages 25 to 55 using Pekee Bar:
- 92% agreed skin was clean of all makeup
- 85% agreed skin felt soft and smooth
- 84% found skin was firmer and more balanced
- 81% found Pekee Bar was calming and soothing

Kiehl’s epidermal skin-texturizing treatment is an advanced formulation with a highly-effective abrading quality on skin's surface. name: Seaberry Skin Nutrition Cleansing Oil
about the product:
What it is:

 An omega-rich cleansing oil that removes impurities and even waterproof makeup while maintaining natural moisture levels for a radiant complexion.

What it is formulated to do:

 Fresh’s Seaberry Skin Nutrition Cleansing Oil contains a blend of nourishing oils and protective extracts that effectively cleanse your skin while maintaining natural moisture levels. Skin is left feeling soft and supple and looking healthy and radiant. 

What else you need to know:

"When I was two, living in a small town in Eastern Siberia, I tipped over a pot of boiling water. My arm was badly burned, and I was rushed to a doctor who treated me with a pasty orange salve that I later learned was seaberry oil. Extracted from a plant native to Russia and the Himalayan region known for thriving in harsh conditions, this nourishing oil has been used for generations as a natural cure.—Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder

Research results:

With ultra-mild micelles, replenishing fatty acids, and antioxidant-rich plant oils, E-Rase™ nourishes skin while dissolving away makeup and dirt, is barrier-supportive, and may be used anytime you need a quick skin refreshment. E-Rase™ is gentle enough to be used all over, including eyes and lips, and is formulated at a pH of 5.0.
This micellar water is free of essential oils, silicones, fragrance, PEGs, and irritants.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.
ingredients: -Micellar Cleansing Blend: A mix of ultra-gentle, dirt- and pollution-capturing surfactants and emollients.

-3-Ceramide Blend: Ceramides AP, NP, and EOP are derived from plant sources and are identical to the wax-like moisturizing ceramides that occur naturally in skin and helpsoothe and maintain the moisture balance of skin while protecting against water loss. Ceramides help fill in the spaces between skin cells, giving them the appearance of elasticity and playing a critical role in supporting the skin barrier.

-Wild Melon Seed Oil: Cold pressed and rich in omega 6 and 9 fatty acids (linoleic and oleic) as well as antioxidant polyphenols, it’s used for its soothing, moisturizing, and barrier-supportive benefits.

name: Beauty Elixir
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A natural cult-favorite toning mist that tightens pores, sets makeup, and provides an instant shot of radiance to the skin.
Dullness and uneven texture, and Pores

This product is vegan, non-toxic, cruelty-free, hypoallergenic, and free of all synthetic chemicals, artificial fragrances, fillers, gluten, and GMOs. At the top of the Beauty Elixir formula, you will notice a tiny ring of darker colored liquid, which is intentional. This ring is simply the natural, essential oil components of the Beauty Elixir that have separated from the water components due to the lack of chemical emulsifiers found within the product. Simply shake the contents before spraying to combine the components.
What else you need to know:

This complexion treatment reduces dullness and is infused with toning rosemary, astringent mint, and soothing rose organic essential oil to prepare your skin for further treatments. The ultimate spa in a bottle. Inspired by Queen Isabelle of Hungary's famous elixir of youth, Beauty Elixir is formulated with grape extracts and clarifying ingredients to provide an immediate burst of radiance.

A cult-favorite among celebrities and makeup artists worldwide, the Beauty Elixir is the ideal setting spray between layers of makeup for a long-lasting and smooth finish. Perfect as an aftershave for men, the formula contains essential oils and plant extracts to clarify and brighten the complexion.

The therapeutic scent from the organic essential oils of mint, rose, and rosemary invigorate throughout the day. Spritz at the office during that lull for a quick pick-me-up, and in the evening to refresh your makeup so that it looks like you just applied it.

"I love Caudalie's Beauty Elixir. I especially like their little one to keep in my handbag—brilliant for traveling. It has quite a lot of essential oils in it, so what I like to do is spray it on my hands and rub them together, then breathe it in. It just smells so amazing and uplifting. And then, I just pat it on my skin. It freshens your makeup."—Lisa Eldridge, celebrity makeup artist

"If your skin still has patches after you apply your foundation, wet your makeup sponge, then spray it with a hydrating treatment like the Caudalie Beauty Elixir and pat it in. Using the same sponge, pat on more foundation if you need more coverage."—Helen Phillips, Sephora Pro Makeup Artist
Your purchase helps the planet. Caudalie donates 1% of sales to plant trees. Merci!

name: Beste™ No. 9 Jelly Cleanser
about the product: A gentle cleanser to remove makeup, excess oil, pollution, and grime that rinses away without residue, leaving skin clean and soft.

- Mild Surfactant Blend: A stack of mild cleansing agents, including coconut-based surfactants rich in fatty acids that work together to create a gentle lather that effectively dissolves even stubborn makeup, sunscreen, and oils while supporting a healthy-looking skin barrier.
- Glycerin: A skin-identical humectant that replenishes hydration levels normally lost during the cleansing process.
- Cantaloupe Fruit Extract: Rich in antioxidants, this extract soothes and hydrates.
This product is vegan and cruelty-free.
What Else You Need to Know:

With a unique blend of mild surfactants and makeup-dissolving emollients, this gentle cleanser is formulated at an ideal, non-stripping pH level of 5.5. Free of SLS, fragrance, essential oils, and silicones, Beste™ No. 9 is appropriate for all skin.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

name: The Deep Cleanse Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A daily gel cleanser with natural fruit exfoliant that thoroughly but gently lifts impurities and unclogs pores while leaving skin soft and hydrated.
If you want to know more…

The Deep Cleanse oil-free gel lathers into a creamy foam to lift away dirt, oil, and impurities without over-drying. It cleanses with amino acids derived from silk gentle enough for even the most delicate skin, leaving skin soft, refreshed, and comfortably hydrated.

The formula harnesses the power of the Japanese luffa fruit, a natural beauty multitasker beloved by Japanese women for centuries. Ground fibers from the fruit exfoliate, helping to turn over dead skin cells while purifying and decongesting pores. The fruit extract also beautifies and conditions skin. Japanese wild rose works to visibly tighten pores and smooth skin texture, while Japanese leopard lily helps minimize excess oil.
What else you need to know:

Harvested under a full autumn moon, the water of luffa fruit has been prized as a favorite natural skincare ingredient in Japan since the Edo period. It is beloved for its clarifying and moisturizing properties. When dried and ground, the fruit gently exfoliates to purify and smooth skin texture—the original inspiration for the modern day loofah sponge. The Deep Cleanse harnesses this time-tested ingredient in this refreshing, easy-to-use daily exfoliating cleanser.
This pure, oil-free formula is non-irritating, non-sensitizing, dermatologist tested, and cruelty-free. It is formulated without synthetic fragrances, sulfate detergents, urea, DEA, of TEA.
Beauty that gives back: every Tatcha purchase you make supports girls’ education around the world. Tatcha is proud to partner with Room to Read to transform girls’ futures.—Victoria Tsai, Founder

about the product: A powerful treatment to visibly soften texture, reduce the appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, even the look of skin’s tone, and enhance visible radiance.

What Else You Need to Know:

The story begins with a chance observation at a sake brewery in Japan where scientists noticed the elderly brewers had wrinkled faces but extraordinarily youthful-looking hands. Intensive searches began out of millions of yeast strains and studies were conducted on hundreds of fermentation conditions.

Now every drop of Pitera™ is produced by cultivating the one exclusive yeast strain under the most stringent conditions that remain SK-II’s most valuable trade secret. This iconic essence’s formula has then remained essentially unchanged for almost 40 years as the full efficacies of Pitera™ have not yet been uncovered; and until now, SK-II is continuing to discover new things it can do. A miracle like no other, Pitera™ is pure power of nature harnessed by advanced technology.
ingredients: -PITERA™: A bio-ingredient derived from yeast fermentation that resembles your skin's Natural Moisturizing Factors; contains over 50 micro-nutrients like vitamins, minerals, amino acids, and organic acids to condition skin's natural functions.

What else you need to know:
This product is vegan, formulated without gluten, hypoallergenic, and cruelty-free. It is suitable for women who are pregnant and breastfeeding.

Edible: skin absorbs 60 percent of the substances that we place on it. So, what we put on our body is just as important as what we put in it. Edible Beauty Australia’s gold standard for purity is an edible ingredient list. This means they use only food-grade ingredients to create their range of therapeutic, wildcrafted, botanical skincare. Products are free of alcohol, fragrance, propylene glycol, preservatives, colors, and synthetics, and come packaged in Miron violet glass, which filters damaging UV rays while preserving and activating the botanical ingredients found inside.

Wildcrafted: the use of Australian wildcrafted botanicals raises the therapeutic profile of each and every formula. Found growing in remote and arid regions of Australia, these plants are forced to develop a strong antioxidant defense and preservation system to survive. When used topically, these qualities transfer to your skin, in the form of potent anti-aging, protective, nourishing, and hydrating benefits.
Clean at Sephora is formulated without a list of over 50 ingredients, including sulfates (SLS and SLES), parabens, phthalates, and more. For the full list, check out the Ingredients tab.

about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
A balancing toner formulated with mineral-rich Umbrian clay that combats skin congestion, absorbs excess oil, and instantly purifies for soft, healthy-looking skin.
If you want to know more…

Umbrian Clay Purifying Facial Toner helps to clear skin of impurities while absorbing excess sebum for a smooth, healthy appearance. Formulated with Fresh's proprietary mineral-rich Umbrian clay, as well as cinnamon bark, burnet root, and lavender floral water, the refreshing liquid formula balances and clarifies the complexion without stripping skin of essential moisture.
What else you need to know:

“Tucked away on the top of a hill in central Italy is a small gem of a town called Nocera Umbra. I traveled to this picturesque village almost 18 years ago to discover their hidden secret—Umbrian clay, an ultra-fine mineral-rich clay. This unique clay has been around for centuries and was even used by the ancient Etruscans for its array of benefits. I have been impressed with its versatility and high level of effectiveness ever since my first visit. I am always excited to develop new products that deliver the clay, which I call a ‘miracle ingredient,’ in its purest form. Our newest innovation is a purifying toner which does just that. Ideal for all skin types, I use the toner to gently remove impurities while toning and balancing my skin. The refreshing formula also minimizes the appearance of my pores without drying out my skin, leaving my complexion soft and smooth. I can’t live without it!”—Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder

This lightly-foaming cleanser is the second step in The Lancer Method. Enriched with a rice amino acid complex, moisture-rich hydrators, and skin soothing agents, it gently removes impurities, surface dirt, and sebum for healthy-looking, refreshed skin.
What else you need to know:

Using his unrivaled clinical experience, Dr. Lancer worked to develop a line of technologically advanced, active ingredient-focused products designed to improve the overall health and appearance of skin, while also giving patients the sought-after ‘Lancer Glow.’ Backed by first-class dermatology, utmost luxury, and true efficacy, Lancer skincare seeks to bring “believable beauty” to all skin.

The Lancer Method, the core of Dr. Lancer’s philosophy, is based on a biological principle universal to all skin: the cellular cycle of renewal. By devising a system that supports this process through manual exfoliation, Dr. Lancer was able to create a unique anti-aging line that delivers beautiful, glowing results to all skin types. The three steps of The Lancer Method dramatically improve the appearance of fine lines, texture, discoloration, and pore size. All of the Lancer treatments are formulated for optimum efficacy and luminous results.
Dr. Lancer insider tip: "The skin is an organ of absorption. Your face is exposed to many harmful environmental stressors. Keeping it meticulously clean is a very effective anti-aging strategy."

- 92% agreed skin feels healthy and intensely moisturized

name: Facial Treatment Cleansing Oil
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
An oil-based cleanser that gently melts away makeup and impurities on the skin’s surface.
If you want to know more…

SK-II Facial Treatment Cleansing Oil is a clear, purifying facial cleanser that conditions the skin while dissolving impurities on the skin’s surface, including makeup, sunscreen, dirt, and pollution. When emulsified with water, this cleansing oil lifts and locks onto hidden sebum and impurities, gently removing them from skin. Formulated with wild rose extract, apple seed extract, and SK-II’s signature ingredient, Pitera™, this oil-based cleanser provides an effective, yet delicate, wash, melting away even the toughest waterproof makeup and keeping skin smooth and hydrated.
What else you need to know:

Double cleansing is a unique Asian beauty skincare practice that is quickly gaining popularity in the Western world. This two-step process is the most effective way to completely wash your face of all impurities, and is key to getting the most out of your skincare routine. Start with an oil-based cleanser, like SK-II’s Facial Treatment Cleansing Oil, to lift away all impurities on the skin’s surface. Follow with a cream or foam cleanser, like SK-II’s Facial Treatment Cleanser (sold separately), to remove any additional dirt, oil, and dead skin cells.
This product is fragrance-free and colorant-free. It contains no GMOs, and is not tested on animals.
ingredients: -Pitera™: A bio-ingredient rich in vitamins, organic acids, minerals, and amino acids that work together to support skin’s natural cell renewal process.
-"Lift and Lock" Mechanism: Activated with water, it offers double benefits of makeup removal and thorough skin cleansing together in one formula.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state.
Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free.

name: Facial Treatment Cleanser
about the product: Which skin type is it good for?
An ultra-hydrating facial cleanser that gently cleans and conditions, leaving your skin fresh and smooth.
If you want to know more…

SK-II’s bestselling Facial Treatment Cleanser is formulated to provide a gentle, ultra-hydrating wash, leaving skin comfortably conditioned and velvety smooth. The creamy formula lathers on with a fine texture, and then bubbles into a luxurious cleansing foam, purifying and moisturizing the skin.

This facial cleanser is a highly effective makeup remover, and is infused with concentrated Pitera™—SK-II’s exclusive active ingredient rich in vitamins, organic acids, minerals, and amino acids—as well as white willow extract to effectively remove embedded impurities around and inside pores, leaving skin feeling clean and fresh.
What else you need to know:

Double cleansing is a unique Asian beauty skincare practice that is quickly gaining popularity in the Western world. This two-step process is the most effective way to completely wash your face of all impurities, and is key to getting the most out of your skincare routine. Start with an oil-based cleanser, like SK-II’s Facial Treatment Cleansing Oil (sold separately), to lift away all impurities on the skin’s surface. Follow with a cream or foam cleanser, like SK-II’s Facial Treatment Cleanser, to remove any additional dirt, oil, and dead skin cells.
This product is fragrance-free and colorant-free. It contains no petrochemicals, and is not tested on animals.

Coconut Melt is a 100 percent pure and unrefined coconut oil that provides rich hydration all over. This oil is ideal for all hair and skin types, including dry skin and chemically treated hair, and is loaded with fatty acids to seal in moisture and lauric acid to refresh.
